LanguageData.MSMedicalMatItem.label: Rolled up medical mat
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatItem.description: A rolled up portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatSpacerItem.label: Rolled up medical mat (Spacer)
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatSpacerItem.description: A rolled up advanced portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatUltraItem.label: Rolled up medical mat (Ultra)
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatUltraItem.description: A rolled up high-tech portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatEarlyItem.label: Rolled up medical mat (early)
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatEarlyItem.description: A rolled up portable mat made from herbal medicine impregnated rope that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
